article_title: Roasting and Toasting Cabaret Rising Star Bridget Everett
article_text:
Lots of rescue dogs descended on the Plaza Hotel Thursday, not to mention Hilary Swank, Edie Falco, Lake Bell, Georgina Bloomberg and Isaac Mizrahi, at the Bergh Ball, which raised $1.4 million for the ASPCA. But if you think that was a wild time, you ain’t seen nothing.

The really wild time was taking place at Stage 48, where Ars Nova, the performing arts nonprofit in Hell’s Kitchen, was holding a benefit.

Most institutions...

twitter.description: Ars Nova raises funds with an evening celebration of Bridget Everett, a raunchy cabaret star with a celebrity following who got her big break at the performing arts nonprofit in 2007.
twitter.title: Roasting and Toasting Cabaret Rising Star Bridget Everett
